tool_description: Get RSS feed data in XML or JSON from any wordpress blog website!
name: Wordpress RSS-Feed
title: Wordpress RSS-Feed

api_list.name: RSS-Feed Data
api_list.description: Get RSS Feed Data in JSON or XML format for any Wordpress blog website. Include "http://" or "https://" in the url in your json data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wordpress-rss-feed.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wordpress-rss-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wordpress-rss-feed.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wordpress-rss-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
